alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 8:48AM MDT until March 22 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, and 4 to 6 inches from Jeffrey City to Waltman. Casper Mountain is expected to receive 6 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, Natrona County Lower Elevations, and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 11 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall late this morning, then again from 3 PM through 9 PM Wednesday. Visibilities of 1/2 mile or less and snowfall rates of 1 inch per hour could occur with the heavier snow bands.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
